name: api_rendering_NavMesh
description: Singleton class to access the baked NavMesh.

properties.name: AddLink
properties.description: Adds a link to the NavMesh. The link is described by the NavMeshLinkData struct.

properties.name: AddNavMeshData
properties.description: Adds the specified NavMeshData to the game.

properties.name: CalculatePath
properties.description: Calculate a path between two points and store the resulting path.

properties.name: CalculateTriangulation
properties.description: Calculates a triangulation of all the NavMeshes that are present in the scene at the time of the cal

properties.name: CreateSettings
properties.description: Creates and returns a new entry of NavMesh build settings available for runtime NavMesh building.

properties.name: FindClosestEdge
properties.description: Locate the closest NavMesh edge from a point on the NavMesh.

properties.name: GetAreaCost
properties.description: Gets the cost for path finding over geometry of the area type.

properties.name: GetAreaFromName
properties.description: Returns the area index for a named NavMesh area type.

properties.name: GetAreaNames
properties.description: Get all the NavMesh area names.

properties.name: GetLinkOwner
properties.description: Gets the object, if any, that is associated with the link instance.

properties.name: GetSettingsByID
properties.description: Returns an existing entry of NavMesh build settings.

properties.name: GetSettingsByIndex
properties.description: Returns an existing entry of NavMesh build settings by its ordered index.

properties.name: GetSettingsCount
properties.description: Returns the number of registered NavMesh build settings.

properties.name: GetSettingsNameFromID
properties.description: Returns the name associated with the NavMesh build settings matching the provided agent type ID.

properties.name: IsLinkActive
properties.description: Determines whether the instance of the link can be used to calculate paths, and if NavMesh agents ca

properties.name: IsLinkOccupied
properties.description: Determines whether or not a NavMesh agent is currently using this link.

properties.name: IsLinkValid
properties.description: Determines whether the link instance is part of the current data used for navigation.

properties.name: Raycast
properties.description: Trace a line between two points on the NavMesh.

properties.name: RemoveAllNavMeshData
properties.description: Removes all NavMesh surfaces and links from the game.

properties.name: RemoveLink
properties.description: Removes a link from the NavMesh.
